name: Rock Paper Scissors (Creagoo)
description:
Do you have a dispute that you want to honestly resolve? But some of you may start cheating, this is wrong. I have an idea! Download the game Rock Paper Scissors, play by the familiar rules and solve your unsolvable question.

The interface in the game is unloaded and will be easy to use. The game has a tutorial if you forgot how to play. 2 languages are supported: Russian (RU) and English (EN). The game saves your last 5 moves, so it will be easy to know the victory.
